short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert to your favorite CASE type with dot or without dot.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts to your favorite CASE. Number with dot or without dot. Number in full. Removes special characters and spaces. Number in AMERICAN pattern (use dot). Shows the total number of characters with space. Fabio I.
